sen.j: 戦国時代 (日本)に世尊寺家（能書で名高い）が断絶し、世尊寺行高の門人だった持明院基春が朝廷の書役を務め、以後書道の家として入木道伝授の宗家（持明院流）となる。
sen.e: In the Sengoku period (period of warring states), the Sesonji family (which was famous for Nosho (excellent calligraphy)) ended, so Motoharu JIMYOIN, a disciple of Yukitaka SESONJI, worked as a clerical in the Imperial Court, and since then the family served as the head family for the initiation of calligraphy.
